name: Space Man (ZtoloGame)
description:
⚡ Fly with the coolest jetpacks in game history
⚡ Avoid spikes, zappers, and guided missiles
⚡ Beat Your Score and compete with your friends
⚡ Equip yourself with high tech gadgets and vehicle upgrades
⚡ Test your reflexes with simple one-finger controls

How To Play : Just Use Space Key To Fly with the jetpacks.
